ðŸ“– Summary: timr-tui is a terminal-based application built with Rust and Ratatui for managing time using Pomodoro timers, countdowns, and general timers. It offers a CLI interface and customizable keybindings for easy control, allowing users to organize their work and track time efficiently within a terminal environment.
